contentPageHeader.title: Careers
contentPageHeader.summary: At MTI, you will be at the forefront of shaping Singaporeâ€™s vibrant economy!

content.content: Join us to create exciting opportunities and good jobs for all. Together with our Statutory Boards, we create a thriving business environment. Come steer the growth of our companies and industries, spur innovation and R&D, and manage our land and energy resources effectively. Come travel the world to unlock new markets for our companies to venture into and discover new trade potential for Singapore.
